text: Irgazen ad uunen tilawin, imi Ismenyafa Oebbi kra $ef kra, ilmend n wayen pseooifen seg wayla nnsen. Tilawin imaanen, iunzen, ipearaben $ef sser n wayen Ieureb Oebbi. Tid s$uo tugadem tuesift, nna$et pent, aazlet pent deg imieoeen, oebbit pent. Ma u$ent awen awal, ur tent ppawvet. Ih, Oebbi Izga Aalay, Meqqweo
